name: nativescript-pushy
description: Lightning-fast, highly-reliable push notification delivery with https://pushy.me

scripts.build: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-pushy && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
scripts.generate.typings.android: echo '##### Download the latest relevant .jar file from https://jcenter.bintray.com/me/pushy/sdk/ and move it into the plugin /src folder' && java -jar ../../android-dts-generator/dts-generator/build/libs/dts-generator.jar -input ./sdk-*.jar -output platforms/android/typings && rimraf sdk-*.jar && echo '##### Done! Deleted the .jar, and generated typings in src/platforms/android/typings'
